Comment: To the surprise of nobody. The Trump administration has been promising to cut income taxes and fund the cost of those  cuts through a tax on goods (tariffs). The whole scheme that Trump has been promoting is to download costs onto the working class in order to inflate the net worth of the ultra wealthy. A tax increase on the rich flies in the face of that ideology.
Author: legocastle77
